DTS:Executable.DTS:TaskContact: Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1
Execute SQL Task; Microsoft Corporation; Microsoft SQL Server 2008 R2; © 2007 Microsoft Corporation; All Rights Reserved;http://www.microsoft.com/sql/support/default.asp;1

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
-- Actualiza en TEMP_H_AFILIADOS_EMPRESAS_LABORAL los campos de la temporal dependiendo si es Cuil_titular o Cuil_opcional
Declare @Periodo int, @Afiliado int, @Subnumero int, @Cuil_tit BIGint, @Cuil_unif BIGint
declare Personas_Cursor cursor for select id_periodo, afiliado, subnumero, cuil_titular, cuil_opcional from TEMP_H_AFILIADOS_EMPRESAS_LABORAL
open Personas_Cursor;
fetch next from Personas_Cursor into @Periodo,@Afiliado,@Subnumero,@Cuil_tit,@Cuil_unif
while @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 begin if @Cuil_unif = 0 begin update TEMP_H_AFILIADOS_EMPRESAS_LABORAL set ID_PERSONA = S.id_persona, SECUENCIA = S.secuencia, CANT_INTEGRANTES = S.cantidad_integrantes_grupo from TEMP_H_AFILIADOS_EMPRESAS_LABORAL T join D_PERSONAS P on P.cuil = T.CUIL_TITULAR join H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA S on S.afiliado = @Afiliado and S.subnumero = @Subnumero and S.id_persona = P.id_persona where T.CUIL_TITULAR = @Cuil_tit AND S.id_periodo = @Periodo and T.CUIL_OPCIONAL = 0 and T.AFILIADO = @Afiliado and T.SUBNUMERO = @Subnumero AND @Cuil_tit <> 0 end else begin update TEMP_H_AFILIADOS_EMPRESAS_LABORAL set ID_PERSONA = S.id_persona, SECUENCIA = S.secuencia, CANT_INTEGRANTES = S.cantidad_integrantes_grupo from TEMP_H_AFILIADOS_EMPRESAS_LABORAL T join D_PERSONAS P on P.cuil = T.CUIL_OPCIONAL join H_COMER_STOCK_AFILIA S on S.afiliado = @Afiliado and S.subnumero = @Subnumero and S.id_persona = P.id_persona where T.CUIL_OPCIONAL = @Cuil_unif AND S.id_periodo = @Periodo and T.AFILIADO = @Afiliado and T.SUBNUMERO = @Subnumero and T.CUIL_OPCIONAL <> 0 end fetch next from Personas_Cursor into @Periodo,@Afiliado,@Subnumero,@Cuil_tit,@Cuil_unif end
close Personas_Cursor; deallocate Personas_Cursor;

property.description: The number of seconds before a command times out. A value of 0 indicates an infinite time-out.

property.description: Specifies the column code page to use when code page information is unavailable from the data source.

property.description: Forces the use of the DefaultCodePage property value when describing character data.
property.name: AlwaysUseDefaultCodePage

property.description: Specifies the mode used to access the database.
property.name: AccessMode

property.description: Indicates whether the values supplied for identity columns will be copied to the destination. If false, values for identity columns will be auto-generated at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepIdentity

property.description: Indicates whether the columns containing null will have null inserted in the destination. If false, columns containing null will have their default values inserted at the destination. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadKeepNulls

property.description: Specifies options to be used with fast load. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadOptions

property.description: Specifies when commits are issued during data insertion. A value of 0 specifies that one commit will be issued at the end of data insertion. Applies only if fast load is turned on.
property.name: FastLoadMaxInsertCommitSize

SQLTask:SqlTaskData.SQLTask:SqlStatementSource:
/* Actualiza variable. */
Select cast (id_periodo as varchar(6)) as id_periodo from AUX_PERIODO_MES_BORRA
